name: claude-code
description: Modern Claude Code CLI integration with TypeScript, OAuth 2.1, subagents, hooks, and checkpoints
long_description: A production-ready MCP server that wraps Claude Code CLI functionality with full TypeScript support, OAuth 2.1 authentication, remote transport (Streamable HTTP), and all modern Claude Code features including subagents, hooks, checkpoints, and extended thinking modes. Supports both local (stdio) and remote (HTTP) deployment with comprehensive security and session management.

tools.name: claude_ask
tools.description: Ask Claude Code CLI a question with full tool access, subagent delegation, hooks, and extended thinking modes

tools.name: claude_plan
tools.description: Create implementation plans using read-only mode with planning tools (Read, Task, TodoRead, TodoWrite)

tools.name: claude_resume
tools.description: Resume previous Claude Code sessions with full context preservation

tools.name: claude_checkpoint
tools.description: Manage checkpoints: create snapshots, list available checkpoints, or restore to previous states

tools.name: claude_subagent_list
tools.description: List all available Claude Code subagents (project-level and user-level)

defaultWorkingDirectory.title: Default Working Directory
defaultWorkingDirectory.description: Default directory for Claude Code operations. If not specified, uses the current working directory.

defaultAllowedTools.title: Default Allowed Tools
defaultAllowedTools.description: Comma-separated list of tools Claude Code can use (e.g., Read,Write,Bash,Edit,Grep). Leave empty to allow all tools.

changes: Complete rewrite in TypeScript for type safety
Added remote transport support (Streamable HTTP per MCP spec 2025-03-26)
Implemented OAuth 2.1 with PKCE and Resource Indicators (RFC 8707)
Added support for Claude Code subagents
Added support for hooks (pre-tool-use, session-start, etc.)
Added extended thinking modes (think, think-harder, ultrathink)
Improved session management with automatic cleanup
Added structured logging with configurable levels
Updated tool annotations per MCP spec 2025-03-26
Improved security with token audience binding
